metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8854 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
wolfSSL before 3.10.2 has an out-of-bounds memory access with loadingcrafted DH parameters, aka a buffer overflow triggered by a malformedtemporary DH file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8854` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl35 - 3.10.2+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.10.2+dfsg-2').
